Sky Firm International is comprised of 4 individual entities, each with their own vertical focus. Sky Firm International Family of Companies: OneTen Technologies: www.OneTenTech.com  Fusion408: www.Fusion408.com Zandermax Technologies: www.ZanderMax.com Zandergreen Technologies: www.ZanderGreen.com We align our clients with the appropriate division dependent upon their hiring needs. This business model ensures our clients receive timely and professional assistance from a team of recruiters / headhunters with an intimate knowledge of their industry. One of our key goals at Sky Firm is to deliver the perfect person for the position within the first 1-3 resume submissions. We truly understand our clients have demanding schedules aside from their interviewing/hiring responsibilities and strive to take utmost care throughout the entire process to ensure a timely and effective hire.

Fusion408 is the premier name in Technical Talent Acquisition. If your looking for your next career opportunity, we can help you find the job of your dreams. If your looking for the technical talent to take your products and services to market, we can help you acquire the talent you'll need to excel your company to the fast lane!

summary: Sky Firm International is a Professional Search and Technical Talent Acquisition / Headhunting firm. OneTen Technologies, Fusion408, ZanderGreen and ZanderMax are members of the Sky Firm International family of talent acquisition companies. We share the same common goals, work ethic, and principles as our parent brand. With more than 10 years in existence, every day we are committed to dealing in a company’s most valuable asset….their people! Let’s be honest, the people make the company!With the WAR for top talent getting hotter every day, you need an aggressive and passionate headhunting firm with an established global network & reach to win the best talent in this war! At Sky Firm we know that there is a BIG difference between the BEST TALENT...and just the best available! We don’t want to see you waste your time competing for candidates who have multiple offers on the table. We specialize in finding you the passive candidates who are always interested in a BETTER opportunity at a great company like yours! Candidate Assistance:Want a better opportunity? Better Pay? Better benefits? Better job security? We all do. Sky Firm is here to represent your best employment interest. We work closely with our client candidates to identify what you’re looking for in a new opportunity. We handle your resume and job search with the utmost privacy and confidentiality. Our team is savvy and discreet in finding you the best opportunity. We work directly with the hiring managers to quickly get you feedback on your resume and expedite your interview process. We’re here to be your voice from inside the company and to position you for the best job offer possible. We want to make sure your resume ONLY goes to the opportunities and companies that are of interest to you! All of our positions are employer fee paid, so our services are always FREE to our client candidates.
